dataConfig.script: function skill_keywords(row) { var name = row.get('user_id'); var value = row.get('keywords'); row.put('keywords_s', value); return row; }

entity.name: service
entity.query: select interface_id as id, server_id, cem_id, interface_data, alias as title, description from dome_interfaces

entity.name: server
entity.query: select url, user_id from servers where server_id = '${service.server_id}'

entity.name: cem_service_categories
entity.query: select cat_id from cem_service_categories where cem_id = '${service.cem_id}'

entity.name: category
entity.query: select name as category_name from service_categories where cat_id = '${cem_service_categories.cat_id}'

entity.name: component
entity.query: select group_id from cem_objects where cem_id = '${service.cem_id}'

entity.name: groups
entity.query: select group_name,unix_group_name, is_public from groups where group_id = '${component.group_id}'
